body.name: UGREEN Wireless Mouse, Ergonomic Bluetooth 5.0 Mouse for Laptop, 2.4G Cordless Mouse with USB Receiver, 1000/1600/2000/4000 DPI, 5 Buttons Silent Mice for MacBook, PC, Desktop, Chromebook, Black

features: [Dual Mode] UGREEN Wireless Bluetooth Mouse offers two connection modes: Bluetooth 5.0 and wireless 2.4G, It supports seamless switching between the two modes with a simple button press, eliminating the need for repetitive connections; For added convenience, it features automatic pairing pop-up support on WIN10 and above

[Full Size Ergonomic Design] This wireless mouse is designed to fit the natural curve of the right hand, catering specifically to right-handed users; Featuring a larger design that fits perfectly in the palm of your hand, you'll have a more pleasant working experience

[Accurate Sensor] The UGREEN Bluetooth mouse has an excellent optical sensor and four adjustable DPI levels (1000/1600/2000/4000); Its accurate positioning enables smooth and precise operation, making it suitable for various desktop environments

[Quieter Click] It is an ideal companion for electronic gadgets in the workplace, conference room, coffee shop, library, or home since our Bluetooth mouse for laptops is made with a quiet click that makes less noise, allowing you to use it without being concerned about bothering others

[Broad Compatibility] This wireless mouse supports both Bluetooth 5.0 and 2.4GHz receiver connectivity options; It is compatible with a wide range of operating systems, including Windows (7/8.1/10/11), macOS (10.15 and above), iOS (13.4 and above), Android (5.0 and above), ChromeOS, and Linux

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Full-Size Ergonomic Design The grip is more comfortable, and the use is more labor-saving, which makes people love it. Next page 1 Ergo Design 2 Broad Compatibility 3 Perfect on Any Surface 4 Perfect on AnyPlace
How to Use 2.4G Manual Pairing Operation Bluetooth Mode Connection Operation Force Pairing in Bluetooth Mode

Where is the USB receiver? Yes, turn the device over and open the back cover to reveal the receiver. Why is the scroll wheel oriented differently on a mac? This is caused by the default system of mac, which is opposite to the direction of Windows. What is DPI ? DPI refers to the scanning accuracy, the higher the value, the higher the sensitivity of the mouse, and the smoother the operation. The product cannot be paired automatically, how to perform manual pairing? 2.4G mode:Press and hold the left + middle + right keys for 3 seconds, then insert the 2.4G Dongle. Bluetooth mode: When the product saves the ID, long press the left + middle + right for 3 seconds to enter the pairing state. What can I do if the Bluetooth pairing fails？ Press the switch button to enter into Bluetooth mode. The indicator will flash in blue when it is switched successfully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Superb design, excellent Bluetooth functionality
reviews.reviewText: I've been using a Tecknet 2.4G/Bluetooth mouse that I bought in August 2022. Recently, that mouse has started to manifest accuracy errors and the mouse cursor frequently disappears from the screen when I haven't moved the mouse for a few minutes (during those periods where I'm just typing). Not earth-shattering problems but pretty annoying. I purchased this UGREEN mouse as a replacement with the hope that it would not have the tracking/clicking accuracy issues of the Tecknet mouse as well as not having the odd disappearing mouse cursor.First, the UGREEN mouse is a bit larger and more ergonomically sculpted than the Tecknet mouse (although it is specifically set up for right-handed folks while the Tecknet mouse is symmetric and so could be used by lefties taking in to account that the back/forward buttons are mounted for righties). I'm male with normal-sized hands and the more pronounced sculpting and taller arc shape of the UGREEN mouse makes it one of the most comfortable mouses I've used (and I've used piles of expensive Logi, Microsoft, and HP premium mouses along with other generic brands like the Tecknet mouse and this one). The side rubber isn't super grippy but the texture is enough to keep it from slipping (and the lack of stickiness will make it less prone to gathering dust and debris). This mouse is VERY quiet. I'm fine with the normal button clicky sound (which the Tecknet mouse made) but, if you're after library quiet mouse click buttons, this one delivers. What surprised me about the UGREEN mouse versus the Tecknet mouse was how it behaves via the Bluetooth connection. The Tecknet mouse absolutely required a button click to wake up both the mouse and then some subsequent jiggling to wake up the computer. This UGREEN mouse just requires that you jiggle it (like you would with a 2.4G wireless connection) to wake it and the computer up. I thought Bluetooth connected mouses go to sleep after a period of time and require an active button click to wake up then some subsequent jiggling to wake up the computer (that's how the Tecknet mouse worked). This is a very pleasant surprise (2.4G wireless wake up behavior, no wireless 2.4G USB receiver plug required). This mouse has 4 dpi modes and the switch for this is intelligently placed on the underside of the mouse (some mouses put the switch up top near the click wheel meaning that you can inadvertently change your desired tracking accuracy). Additionally, when you press the switch, a small, red LED will blink once, twice, thrice, or four times to let you know which tracking mode you're in (for me, mode #3, 2000 dpi, was just fine; mode #4, 4000 dpi moved the cursor a little too fast for regular computer work but might be of interest to gamers).I will say that setting up the initial Bluetooth connect to my computer was fairly clumsy and it took me several attempts before I got the mouse to appear in the list of available Bluetooth devices so that I could connect it (didn't really have that issue with the Tecknet mouse). But, once connected, it is solid and, given that this is a one-time connection, I'm not particularly concerned (but hang on to the instruction manual just in case you need to connect this mouse to another computer down the road). I haven't tried out the multiple device connection feature as yet but it's nice to know that it's there as I may purchase another of these mouses for my wife who uses both a Windows laptop and a Macbook Pro laptop (currently using two different - and very expensive - Logi mouses for each and neither of them performs any better than this UGREEN mouse).If the accuracy and wonderful Bluetooth behavior of this mouse holds up over time then this mouse will certainly deserve all five stars I've given it today.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mouse with a punch
reviews.reviewText: The UGREEN Wireless Mouse, Ergonomic Bluetooth 5.0 Mouse is an excellent product. Connected right up to the computer, no issues. Lighting fast in movement and handles amazing. The ergonomic design is perfect in your hand. I was looking for a great handling mouse just for everyday computer use. For those spending hours this would be a perfect fit. This mouse delivers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have to admit, this mouse is lives up to its claim as being quiet. It's not totally silent, but is the quietest clicker I've ever used. It is replacing my previous mouse from Tecknet, which is supposedly "silent" also, after its left button became sporadic. The UGREEN mouse is quieter than the Tecknet, both the main buttons and especially the side buttons. I find it is also slightly more comfortable than the Tecknet. The only downside is that it is slightly "stickier" on the movement. Not terrible, but I have always preferred using a neoprene mousepad, and this mouses drags on the pad. It's not as bad when used directly on a desk surface, but still not as smooth of a slider as the Tecknet. But man, is it quiet. If that's important to you, this is the mouse to get.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST Mouse!!
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to write a review on this mouse because it's by far better than anything I've had. I simply plugged the USB adapter into the computer and it came right up. All of the functions on the mouse are remarkably smooth and fits your hand perfectly! The roller, pointer and side buttons are completely quite and easy to use. I was hesitant to purchase it because I wasn't familiar with the manufacturer but have been very pleasantly surprised at the quality, speed and ease of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The mouse looks fancy and expensive. It has a very comfortable design. The buttons are really silent. The Bluetooth connection speed is impressive. The mouse works in any surface.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Defective Battery Slot
reviews.reviewText: The battery slot is defective. Placing in the battery at that moment, it works fine. The second I put the cover back on, the mouse turns off and is unresponsive. Doesn't turn back on unless I remove the cover. I decided to sand down a piece that put pressure onto the battery. Fixed it. Now the mouse works like a charm as if there wasn't an issue to begin with. Although, I'm still disappointed it was defective in the first place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I tried ordering the logi 305 mouse on a prime day deal. When it didn't make it to me and they wouldn't let me order a new one at the prime discount, I found this mouse.WOWAt a third of the price, I'm happy with this. It's lightweight, easy to use, feels great in handI'm only using it for office work and the such and wouldn't buy this one again in a heartbeat

reviews.reviewerName: Fueron un regalo a mi papá 58 años y refiere que mejoró con la fatiga, que se siente con más energía y duerme mejor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 13, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Das hier ist nun die dritte Maus innerhalb von einem Jahr, da sich bei den Vorgängern immer das Gummi vom Scrollrad gelöst hat. Hier ist das Scrollrad aus einem Gummistück, sodass sich der Fehler nicht wiederholen kann.Bluetooth Einbindung war sehr einfach und funktioniert zuverlässig. Insgesamt wirkt die Maus sehr robust. Großer Pluspunkt: Die Klickgeräusche sind sehr leise
